titleStmt.title: The perfection, authority, and credibility of the Holy Scriptures. Discoursed in a sermon before the University of Cambridge, at the commencement, July 4. 1658. / By Nathanael Ingelo D.D. and Fellow of Eton Coll.
titleStmt.author: Ingelo, Nathaniel, 1621?-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.T. for Luke Fawn, at the sign of the Parrot in Pauls Church yard.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "October"; the 9 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with an "8".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Parrot in Pauls Church yard.
